ygData.subject: Re: possible cheat... Off topic - Longish
ygData.msgSnippet: From:  Why is everyone assuming that the datastream is encrypted?  Within a month of attempting it another group had an everquest
ygData.messageBody:
From: <dwarren@...>
Why is everyone assuming that the datastream is encrypted? Within
a month of attempting it another group had an everquest *SERVER*
emulatorthat was able to have a client walk around the world and see
monsters that they spawned. Surely you don't think they had time to break
ANY encoding and *STILL* be able to analyize the protocol to the point of
having a working server do you?

I never said it was encrypted. I was making comments about the possibility
that it may be, and comments about someone else saying it was encrypted.
